content.text: Hi Joanna! What's your favorite horror film?
My favorite horror film is The Conjuring. I love the atmosphere and the scares are so good.
I've heard good things about that movie! I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's really good. I love the way the filmmakers create a sense of dread and suspense.
I'm a big fan of horror movies too. I love the way they can make me feel like I'm on the edge of my seat.
Me too! I love that feeling of being scared but also being entertained.
I'm also a big fan of the practical effects in horror movies. I think they're so much more effective than CGI.
I agree! Practical effects always look more realistic and believable.
I'm so glad to meet someone who shares my love of horror movies!
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who gets it.
So, what are some of your other favorite horror films?
I love the original Halloween, The Exorcist, and The Shining.
Those are all great movies! I love the way they all create a sense of unease and dread.
Me too! I love being scared but also being entertained.
I'm so glad to meet someone who shares my love of horror movies!
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who gets it.
